tagline: Countdown birthdays, calendar events and reminders
description: Pinning is a powerful countdown app that integrates with calendars and reminders. You can create events and organize them with notebooks. Pinning supports iCloud collaboration so that you can easily share important events with family and friends.

name: Bread Budgeting 2.0
tagline: A cute budgeting app to help manage your bread
description: Struggling to stick to your budget? Bread Budgeting turns personal finance into a fun game. Unlock new unique bread characters each month you stay in your budget, and add your partner, family and friends to see how they are doing on their monthly goals!
